data.prayer: Lord, cause a passion for prayer among the people of Belgaum, Karnataka, India.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Belgaum, Karnataka, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in Belgaum, Karnataka, India so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the county of Belgaum access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.prayer: Jesus, call those who are far off in Belgaum, Karnataka, India, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Velip people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Velip people.
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the county of Belgaum to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Belgaum, Karnataka, India to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Belgaum, Karnataka, India to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

location.name: Belgaum
location.people_groups_list: Gondaru, Komarpaik, Gauda, tribe, Padiar, Kotegar
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Gondaru (97,000), Komarpaik (27,000), Gauda, tribe (106,000), Padiar (1,200), Kotegar (6,600)
